choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Dear [BOSSES_NAME],

I hope this letter finds you in good health and high spirits. After much thought, I have decided to move on from our current position at [COMPANY] for personal reasons. My last day will be [LAST_DAY].

In the time that I've spent here, I have learned so many valuable lessons and gained immense knowledge about the industry. Working with you has been an incredible experience, and it is truly bittersweet to leave this position behind. However, I am confident in my decision to pursue new opportunities and challenges elsewhere.

Before I go, there are a few things that I would like to express:
- Firstly, thank you for your constant support and guidance throughout these years. You have been an exemplary leader who has always encouraged me to grow professionally and personally.
- Secondly, it has been truly rewarding working alongside such talented colleagues at [COMPANY]. I will cherish the memories made here forever.
- Lastly, please do not hesitate to reach out if you ever need any assistance or recommendations for my replacement in this position. I am more than happy to help during this transition period.

Once again, thank you for everything and best wishes for your continued success at [COMPANY]. Farewell!
